alert.note: Alert for Athens; Gallia; Jackson; Meigs; Morgan; Perry; Vinton; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 23 at 10:57AM EST until December 24 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills 20 below to as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Kentucky, southeast Ohio, southwest Virginia and the lowlands and lower mountainous terrain of West Virginia. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon EST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Protect pets from the cold. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
